Param.Name: sPaymentAmount
Param.Description: Payment Amount need to verify - not contains $ - not contains comma - must contains dot (if any)|null means by pass filter by Payment Amount

Param.Name: sPaymentMethod
Param.Description: Payment Method need to verify - null means by pass filter by Payment Method

Param.Name: sNumberOfResult
Param.Description: Number of Payment after filter - null means by pass checking this

Keyword.Name: SearchInPaymentPage
Keyword.Description: Search in payment page in Pending Tab - This keyword should use after keyword FilterInPaymentPage - This keyword is not support Search with Operator # (Images\Customer\Payment\16.png)

Param.Name: sViewType
Param.Description: Select ViewType, null means by pass select it, let it default (Pending Payments)

Param.Name: sFieldName
Param.Description: Field Name

Param.Name: sOperator
Param.Description: Operator need to compare

Param.Name: sValue
Param.Description: Value need to input on Input Value

Param.Name: sValue2
Param.Description: Value 2, this field will display when user select Operator = RANGE

Param.Name: sTimeToSearch
Param.Description: Time after click Search button - in case search action take a lot of time

Param.Name: sExpectedResultCount
Param.Description: Number of result - It | 0: not found | 1: found 1 result | null: not check - by pass this parameter - use in case add multiple search

Param.Description: Select Transaction Type | Payables Invoices | Payments | Any

Param.Name: sFieldName
Param.Description: Field name need to filter

Param.Name: sOperator
Param.Description: Operator =|Range|...

Param.Name: sValue
Param.Description: Default Value Input - Date time with format MMddyyyy

Param.Name: sValue2
Param.Description: Second Value use in case of sOperator is RANGE - Date time with format MMddyyyy

Param.Name: sTimeToSearch
Param.Description: Time after click Search button - in case search action take a lot of time

Param.Description: Number of result | 0: not found | 1: found 1 result | null: not check - by pass this parameter - use in case add multiple search

Keyword.Name: SelectABatch
Keyword.Description: Select A Batch based on its ordinal or Batch Name in Tab Batch on Payment File - This keyword is used after keyword SortPaymentBatch (Images\Customer\Payment\7.png)

Param.Name: sOrdinal
Param.Description: Ordinal of Batch Name in the List of Batch - input in range 1 --> 10 - null means by pass select Batch based on its ordinal

Param.Name: sBatchName
Param.Description: Batch Name need to select in the List of Batch - keyword only support select first 10 Batches in the Batch List - null means by pass select Batch base on Batch Name

Keyword.Name: VerifyDoActionPaymentInBatch
Keyword.Description: Verify (and DoAction) on a Payment is exist or not in a Batch based on Payment Number or Payee Name or Payment Amount or Payment Method, this keyword is used after keyword SelectABatch (Images\Customer\Payment\15.png)

Param.Name: sPaymentNumber
Param.Description: Payment Number need to verify - null means by pass filter by Payment Number

Param.Name: sPayeeName
Param.Description: Payee Name need to verify - null means by pass filter by Payee Name

Param.Name: sPaymentAmount
Param.Description: Payment Amount need to verify - not contains $ - not contains comma - must contains dot (if any)|null means by pass filter by Payment Amount

Param.Name: sPaymentMethod
Param.Description: Payment Method need to verify - null means by pass filter by Payment Method

Param.Name: sNumberOfResult
Param.Description: Number of Payment after filter - null means by pass checking this

Param.Name: sActionNameOnFirstPayment
Param.Description: Do Action on first Payment found by filter above - null means by pass this action

Keyword.Name: VerifyPaymentProperties
Keyword.Description: Verify Properties of a Payment, must open this side bar property page before (https://i.imgur.com/xEEv2Aw.png)

Param.Name: sPropertyName
Param.Description: Name of property need to check - separate by semi-colon ;

Keyword.Param: Transaction ID;Status;File Name;Last Modified By;Last Modified

Param.Name: sValue
Param.Description: Value need to check - separate by semi-colon ; - null means empty

Param.Name: sExpected
Param.Description: Expected result true|false

Keyword.Name: VerifyBatchInfo
Keyword.Description: Find A Batch based on its ordinal or Batch Name and check its Info in Tab Batch on Payment File - This keyword should use after keyword SortPaymentBatch (Images\Customer\Payment\17.png)

Param.Name: sOrdinal
Param.Description: Ordinal of Batch Name in the List of Batch - keyword only support select first 30 Batches in the Batch List - null means by pass select Batch based on its ordinal

Param.Name: sBatchName
Param.Description: Batch Name need to select in the List of Batch - keyword only support select first 30 Batches in the Batch List - null means by pass select Batch base on Batch Name - Find by contains not specific

Param.Name: sBankAccountName
Param.Description: Bank Account Name need to verify - null means by pass verify it

Param.Name: sNumberOfPayment
Param.Description: Number Of Payment in this Batch - null means by pass verify it

Param.Name: sTotalAmount
Param.Description: Total Amount of this Batch - don't input currency symbol - comma and dot is required if any - null means by pass verify it

Param.Name: sStatus
Param.Description: Status of this Batch - null means by pass verify it

Param.Description: Text need to input in the filter - Brett's Batch - null

Param.Description: Number of Batch found - null: means not check

Param.Description: Select first result or input number - yes - 0 - 1 - null

Keyword.Name: VerifyDoActionPaymentInBatchTabProcessed
Keyword.Description: Processed Tab - Verify (and DoAction) on a Payment is exist or not in a Batch based on Payment Number or Payee Name or Payment Amount or Payment Method, this keyword is used after keyword FilterProcessedBatch - Note: This keyword is similar with keyword (Images\Customer\Payment\18.png)

Param.Name: sPaymentNumber
Param.Description: Payment Number need to verify - null means by pass filter by Payment Number

Param.Name: sPayeeName
Param.Description: Payee Name need to verify - null means by pass filter by Payee Name

Param.Name: sPaymentAmount
Param.Description: Payment Amount need to verify - not contains $ - not contains comma - must contains dot (if any)|null means by pass filter by Payment Amount

Param.Name: sPaymentMethod
Param.Description: Payment Method need to verify - null means by pass filter by Payment Method

Param.Name: sNumberOfResult
Param.Description: Number of Payment after filter - null means by pass checking this

Param.Name: sActionNameOnFirstPayment
Param.Description: Do Action on first Payment found by filter above - null means by pass this action

Keyword.Name: CreateNewBankAccount
Keyword.Description: Create New Bank Account - And/Or Verify Status of Create Button after input parameters (Images\Customer\BankAccount\2.png)

Param.Name: sBankAccountName
Param.Description: Bank Account Name - Note that this field is required field - null means by pass input it

Param.Name: sBankName
Param.Description: Bank Name - Note that this field is required field - null means by pass input it

Param.Name: sAddress
Param.Description: input Address1;Address2;Address3, separate by semicolon ";", null means by pass input equivalent Address

Param.Name: sCity
Param.Description: City - null means by pass input it

Param.Name: sCountry
Param.Description: Country - null means by pass input it

Param.Name: sState
Param.Description: State - null means by pass input it

Param.Name: sZipCode
Param.Description: Zip Code - null means by pass input it

Param.Name: sPhone
Param.Description: Phone Number - null means by pass input it

Param.Name: sFax
Param.Description: Fax Number - null means by pass input it

Param.Name: sRoutingNumber
Param.Description: Routing Number - Note that this field is required field - null means by pass input it

Param.Name: sAccountNumber
Param.Description: Account Number - Note that this field is required field - null means by pass input it

Param.Name: sFractionalRoutingNumber1
Param.Description: Fractional Routing Number 1 - null means by pass input it

Param.Name: sFractionalRoutingNumber2
Param.Description: Fractional Routing Number 2 - null means by pass input it

Param.Name: sPositivePay
Param.Description: Positive Pay - null means by pass input it

Param.Name: sBankID
Param.Description: In case of PositivePay = WellsFargo, this field is required, null means by pass input

Param.Name: sCashAccount
Param.Description: Cash Account - null means by pass input it

Param.Name: sVirtualCardAccount
Param.Description: Virtual Card Account - null means by pass input it

Param.Name: sBankAccountStatus
Param.Description: Bank Account Status - true means enable - false means disable - null means by pass input it

Param.Name: sExpectedCreateStatus
Param.Description: Success or UnSuccess, null means by pass verify

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: CheckCreateButton(Enable|Disable|EnableAndClick) - means check Status of Create Button is Disable or Enable, EnableAndClick means if button is Enable then click it

Keyword.Name: ClickProcessOnFirstPayment
Keyword.Description: Select first payment and click on Icon Process, before using this keyword: use keyword SearchInPaymentPage to get only one result, after using this keyword: use keyword ProcessPaymentBatch (Images\Customer\Payment\43.png)

Keyword.Name: ProcessPaymentBatch
Keyword.Description: Process Payment or Batch, must open Process Payment/Batch Popup before use this keyword, in normally, this keyword is use after keyword DoActionOnFirstPaymentBatch or SelectDoActionOnABatch with action Name: Process Batch or ClickProcessOnFirstPayment(Images\Customer\Payment\9.png)

Param.Name: sOverridePaymentDate
Param.Description: Check or Uncheck on checkbox Override Payment Date with Processing Date

Param.Name: sSendPaymentEmailNotifications
Param.Description: Check or Uncheck on checkbox Send Payment E-mail Notifications

Param.Name: sIncludeRemittanceDetails
Param.Description: Check or Uncheck on checkbox Include Remittenace Details

Param.Name: sACHEffectiveEntryDate
Param.Description: Check or Uncheck on checkbox Include Remittenace Details - Format MM/dd/yyyy - null means leave if by default value

Param.Name: sExpectedProcess
Param.Description: Success or Unsuccess

Param.Name: sDownloadACH
Param.Description: yes or no - yes means download when process success - no means no download

Keyword.Name: SortPaymentBatches
Keyword.Description: Sort Payment Batches in Tab BATCHES on Payment Page (Images\Customer\Payment\6.png)

Param.Name: sField
Param.Description: Field name - Batch Name - Bank Account Name - Total Payments - Total Batch Amount - Batch Create Date

Param.Name: sSortType
Param.Description: Sort Type - Ascending(A-Z) - Descending(Z-A)

Keyword.Name: VerifyBatchInfo
Keyword.Description: Find A Batch based on its ordinal or Batch Name and check its Info in Tab Batch on Payment File - This keyword should use after keyword SortPaymentBatch (Images\Customer\Payment\17.png)

Param.Name: sOrdinal
Param.Description: Ordinal of Batch Name in the List of Batch - keyword only support select first 30 Batches in the Batch List - null means by pass select Batch based on its ordinal

Param.Name: sBatchName
Param.Description: Batch Name need to select in the List of Batch - keyword only support select first 30 Batches in the Batch List - null means by pass select Batch base on Batch Name - Find by contains not specific

Param.Name: sBankAccountName
Param.Description: Bank Account Name need to verify - null means by pass verify it

Param.Name: sNumberOfPayment
Param.Description: Number Of Payment in this Batch - null means by pass verify it

Param.Name: sTotalAmount
Param.Description: Total Amount of this Batch - don't input currency symbol - comma and dot is required if any - null means by pass verify it

Param.Name: sStatus
Param.Description: Status of this Batch - null means by pass verify it

Keyword.Name: FilterProcessedBatch
Keyword.Description: Filter Batch in tab Processed on Payment File (Images\Customer\Payment\2.png)

Param.Name: sCheckNoBatchFound
Param.Description: Check No Batch Found - yes: check - null: not check

Param.Name: sSearchText
Param.Description: Text need to input in the filter - Brett's Batch - null

Param.Name: sNumberOfResult
Param.Description: Number of Batch found - null: means not check

Param.Description: Select first result or input number - yes: means click - null

Keyword.Name: VerifyDoActionPaymentInBatchTabProcessed
Keyword.Description: Processed Tab - Verify (and DoAction) on a Payment is exist or not in a Batch based on Payment Number or Payee Name or Payment Amount or Payment Method, this keyword is used after keyword FilterProcessedBatch - Note: This keyword is similar with keyword VerifyDoActionPaymentInBatchTabBatches, different Tab (Images\Customer\Payment\18.png)

Param.Name: sPaymentNumber
Param.Description: Payment Number need to verify - null means by pass filter by Payment Number

Param.Name: sPayeeName
Param.Description: Payee Name need to verify - null means by pass filter by Payee Name

Param.Name: sPaymentAmount
Param.Description: Payment Amount need to verify - not contains $ - not contains comma - must contains dot (if any)|null means by pass filter by Payment Amount

Param.Name: sPaymentMethod
Param.Description: Payment Method need to verify - null means by pass filter by Payment Method

Param.Name: sNumberOfResult
Param.Description: Number of Payment after filter - null means by pass checking this

Param.Name: sActionNameOnFirstPayment
Param.Description: Do Action on first Payment found by filter above - null means by pass this action

Keyword.Name: VerifyPaymentProperties
Keyword.Description: Verify Properties of a Payment, must open this side bar property page before (Images\Customer\Payment\26.png)

Param.Name: sPropertyName
Param.Description: Name of property need to check - separate by semi-colon ; - null means by pass verify, in case of you just need to use sOptional

Keyword.Param: Last Card Activity;Last Modified By;Card Status

Param.Name: sValue
Param.Description: Value need to check - separate by semi-colon ; - With Property Name Type is Date Format: keyword will verify by contains not full string - null means empty

Param.Name: sExpected
Param.Description: Expected result true|false

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: ClickLastCardActivity(true) - it will click on the link of Last Card Activity

Keyword.Name: SearchInPaymentPage
Keyword.Description: Search in payment page in Pending Tab - This keyword should use after keyword FilterInPaymentPage - This keyword is not support Search with Operator # (Images\Customer\Payment\16.png)

Param.Name: sViewType
Param.Description: Select ViewType, null means by pass select it, let it default (Pending Payments)

Param.Name: sFieldName
Param.Description: Field Name

Param.Name: sOperator
Param.Description: Operator need to compare

Param.Name: sValue
Param.Description: Value need to input on Input Value

Param.Name: sValue2
Param.Description: Value 2, this field will display when user select Operator = RANGE

Param.Name: sTimeToSearch
Param.Description: Time after click Search button - in case search action take a lot of time

Param.Name: sExpectedResultCount
Param.Description: Number of result - It | 0: not found | 1: found 1 result | null: not check - by pass this parameter - use in case add multiple search

Param.Description: input Address1;Address2;Address3, separate by semicolon ";", null means by pass input equivalent Address

Keyword.Name: SetupACH1
Keyword.Description: Setup ACH 1 - This keyword will setup/modify ACH info on 2 tabs Security Record and File Header Record, Use this keyword after keyword SelectABankAccountAndEditACHInfo ,After using this keyword, next keyword to use must be ACHSetup2 (Images\Customer\BankAccount\7.png)

Param.Name: sStandardEntryClass
Param.Description: Chose Standard Entry Class, null means by pass select, let it default

Param.Name: sCheckSecurityRecord
Param.Description: Check on check box security record - true means set on, false means set off - null means by pass check, let it default

Param.Name: sSecurityRecord
Param.Description: Input security record, null means by pass input

Param.Name: sReferenceCode
Param.Description: Input Reference code, null means by pass input

Param.Name: sImmediateOrigin
Param.Description: Input Immediate Origin, note that this is required field in product, 9 numbers, null means by pass input

Param.Name: sImmediateOriginName
Param.Description: Input Immediate Origin Name, null means by pass input

Param.Name: sImmediateDestination
Param.Description: Input Immediate Origin Destination, note that this is required field in product, 9 numbers, null means by pass input

Param.Name: sImmediateDestinationName
Param.Description: Input Immediate Destination Name, null means by pass input

Param.Name: sCheckBlockingFactor
Param.Description: Check on check box Blocking Factor - true means set on, false means set off - null means by pass check it, let it default

Param.Name: sBlockCharacter
Param.Description: Select Block Character, one character or digit, null means let it default

Keyword.Name: SetupACH2
Keyword.Description: Setup ACH 2 - This keyword is the continue of keyword SetupACH1, it will setup information on last 3 tabs in ACH setup page, you need to use keyword SetupACH1 before using this keyword (Images\Customer\BankAccount\13.png)

Param.Description: Set value for Company Entry Description, note that this field is required field, null means by pass input it

Param.Name: sCompanyDiscretionaryData
Param.Description: set value for Company Discretionary Data, null means by pass input

Param.Description: set value for Default Effective Date, note that this field is require field,null means by pass input

Param.Name: sCompanyDescriptiveDate
Param.Description: select Company Descriptive Date, null means by pass select

Param.Name: sOriginatingDFIIdentification
Param.Description: set value for Originating DFI Identification, note that this is required field in product, null means by pass input

Param.Name: sICD
Param.Description: select Identification Code Designator, null means by pass select

Param.Name: sCompanyIdentification
Param.Description: set value for Company Identification, note that this field is required field, null means by pass input it

Param.Name: sIndividualIdentificationNumber
Param.Description: select value for Individual Identification Number, null means by pass select it

Param.Name: sDiscretionaryData
Param.Description: set value for Discretionary Data, null means by pass input it

Param.Name: sTraceNumber
Param.Description: select value for Trace Number, null means by pass select it

Param.Description: input value for Trace Number, see image Images\Customer\BankAccount\13.png, note that this field is required field, null means by pass select it

Param.Description: Number of result - It | 0: not found | 1: found 1 result | null: not check - by pass this parameter - use in case add multiple search

Keyword.Name: ExecuteSQLQueries

Param.Description: List of unexpected string need to verify - separate with "|"

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: String Optional - use in case we need more parameters

Keyword.Name: VerifyDoActionPaymentInBatchTabProcessed
Keyword.Description: Processed Tab - Verify (and DoAction) on a Payment is exist or not in a Batch based on Payment Number or Payee Name or Payment Amount or Payment Method, this keyword is used after keyword FilterProcessedBatch - Note: This keyword is similar with keyword VerifyDoActionPaymentInBatchTabBatches, different Tab (Images\Customer\Payment\18.png)

Param.Name: sPayeeName
Param.Description: Payee Name need to verify - null means by pass filter by Payee Name

Param.Name: sPaymentAmount
Param.Description: Payment Amount need to verify - not contains $ - not contains comma - must contains dot (if any)|null means by pass filter by Payment Amount

Param.Name: sPaymentMethod
Param.Description: Payment Method need to verify - null means by pass filter by Payment Method

Param.Name: sNumberOfResult
